SELECT r.name, count(dr.product_no) num FROM delivery_regions dr INNER JOIN regions r ON dr.area_no = r.no WHERE r.no = #{i} GROUP BY r.name
SELECT r.name, count(dr.product_no) num FROM delivery_regions dr INNER JOIN regions r ON dr.area_no = r.no AND r.prior_no is not NULL WHERE r.prior_no = #{i} group by r.name
